mobile.name: Guardian guard
mobile.long_descr: A Guardian of Hell stands here, keeping you the Hell out.
mobile.description:
The guardian is a stone devil, a hideous creation from the dark laboratories
                   |of Hell.  Its black eyes stare into your soul with a hunger that makes you
                   |shiver.  The guardian stands motionless before you.  Its rough grey skin
                   |looks impervious to normal weapons.

mobile.name: pile coins
mobile.long_descr: A pile of gold coins lies on the ground.
mobile.description: A large sparkly pile of gold coins.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: male dee demon
mobile.long_descr: The male demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
mobile.description:
This is the most handsome male you have ever seen.  The well-defined
                   |muscles on his naked body make your mouth water.

mobile.name: female dee demon
mobile.long_descr: The female demon Dee lies on the bed, waiting to please you.
mobile.description:
This is the most beautiful female you have ever seen. The curves of her
                   |naked body make you sweat and babble uncontrollably.

mobile.name: bar gold
mobile.long_descr: A shiny gold bar lies on the ground.
mobile.description: This gold bar must be worth bucks!
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: chicken pot pie
mobile.long_descr: A yummy looking chicken pot pie is here.
mobile.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with chicken and vegetables.

mobile.name: beef pot pie
mobile.long_descr: A yummy looking beef pot pie is here.
mobile.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with beef and vegetables.

mobile.name: vegetable pot pie
mobile.long_descr: A yummy looking vegetable pot pie is here.
mobile.description: You see a golden-crusted pot pie filled with vegetables.

mobile.name: damned soul
mobile.long_descr: A damned soul wanders aimlessly here.
mobile.description:
You see the faint silhouette of a person. Looking closely at it, you can barely 
                   |make out features that would identify it as the person it was in life.

mobile.name: tortured soul
mobile.long_descr: A tortured soul screams out in pain.
mobile.description:
You see a unrecognizable person going through unheard-of and
                   |indescribable torture. It screams out at you in pain and terror.

mobile.name: half-eaten person
mobile.long_descr: A half-eaten person lies here, writhing in agony.
mobile.description:
This poor soul looks as if he has been chewed on and spit out.  He writhes
                   |He is in agony and terror as he gasps frantically for Death to answer his
                   |desperate plea...

mobile.name: living wall
mobile.long_descr: A wall stands here. Its surface seems to move and come to life...
mobile.description:
The wall consists of greying and sinewy flesh - faces, hands,
                   |broken bones, feet, and toes jutting from the surface. You hear low moans
                   |of horror, pain, and sorrow issuing from within.

mobile.name: skeletal warrior
mobile.long_descr: A skeletal warrior wanders the planes of Hell.
mobile.description:
Rotting flesh and gore drop from the bones of this creature.
                   |Its decaying eyes stare at you intently as it sees only your
                   |delicious and juicy brain.

mobile.name: bloody severed arm
mobile.long_descr: A bloody severed arm lies here.
mobile.description:
The bloody arm of some poor, luckless individual.  The stench of the
                   |gore-covered limb makes you want to retch.

mobile.name: bloody severed foot
mobile.long_descr: A bloody severed foot lies here.
mobile.description: This bloody foot definitely wasn't a lucky one.

mobile.name: bloody severed nose
mobile.long_descr: A bloody severed nose lies here.
mobile.description:
I wonder how the person that lost this smells...Hopefully not as bad as
                   |this nose does...

mobile.name: blood
mobile.long_descr: The blood in the fountain gurgles merrily.
mobile.description: You see gallons and gallons of thick red blood gurgling in the fountain.

mobile.name: Lost soul
mobile.long_descr: A lost soul stands here looking lost.
mobile.description:
This soul is definitely clueless to as where he is. He holds a ticket
                   |that reads #14349023402342039840293481234900049.

mobile.name: crispy critter
mobile.long_descr: A crispy critter is here, being burned to death.
mobile.description:
This was once a person.  Now it is only a charred and smoking hulk that
                   |is being burned for eternity.  It screams out as the flames lick at its
                   |body and devour its flesh...

mobile.name: pile bones skeleton
mobile.long_descr: A decaying pile of bones lies on the ground.
mobile.description:
Stringy bits of flesh blow gently in the breeze. The bones rattle as you walk
                   |by them.

mobile.name: manes sub-demon
mobile.long_descr: A manes wanders the planes of Hell, looking for something to kill.
mobile.description:
A gruesome sub-demon who used to be mortal, this is a semi-intelligent
                   |creature who attacks, with nails and teeth, anyone it encounters.  It is
                   |often fed upon by demon lords and princes.  Its green-and-red blotched
                   |skin gives it a diseased and decaying look.  It somewhat resembles a
                   |shadow or a ghost.

mobile.name: prisoner raiden
mobile.long_descr: The prisoner of Hell, Raiden sits here for eternity.
mobile.description:
This is a sad individual. He smells strongly of the rotten food that has been
                   |thrown at him. He sits here chained to the wall, banished to Hell forever by
                   |the gods.

mobile.name: prisoner hell
mobile.long_descr: A sad looking individual sits here, awaiting torture.
mobile.description:
She is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over her.  Many scars
                   |and burns cover her face and arms.  The appalling condition of her once-lovely
                   |breasts makes you avert your eyes.

mobile.name: prisoner hell
mobile.long_descr: A sad looking individual sits here ,awaiting torture.
mobile.description:
He is sad-looking, indeed:  cuts and scrapes all over him.  Many scars
                   |and burns cover his face and arms.  One of his arms is broken at the
                   |elbow and hangs limply by his side.

mobile.name: demonguard demon guard
mobile.long_descr: A demonguard patrols the planes of Hell.
mobile.description:
This very large demon stands before you, licking his daggerlike teeth.
                   |Yellow spittle runs down the scales of his blackened skin.

mobile.name: burning fool
mobile.long_descr: A burning fool is here, crisping away.
mobile.description:
You can barely make out anything on it. All you can make out are the flames 
                   |of Hell consuming it, and the smell of burning flesh.

mobile.name: construction worker male
mobile.long_descr: A construction worker is here, welding pipework.
mobile.description:
He is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
                   |As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
                   |             '4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

mobile.name: construction worker female
mobile.long_descr: A construction worker, is here working riviting framework.
mobile.description:
She is the typical construction worker:  T-shirt, jeans, yellow hard hat.
                   |As you look closer at the hard hat, you notice that it says:
                   |             '4th DEMONsion Construction Co.'

mobile.name: fire devil
mobile.long_descr: A fire devil stands here with a box of matches, lighting up poor souls.
mobile.description:
It is an indescribably grotesque creature.  Its pale, green-yellow skin
                   |erupts with blisters and puss.  As you look at it, it smiles at you with
                   |sharp, blood-covered teeth.  This is definitely a face only a mother could
                   |love.

mobile.name: wall fire
mobile.long_descr: A wall of fire is here, creeping slowly across the room.
mobile.description:
It is simply a large, door-sized wall of fire.  It slowly inches across the
                   |room, burning everything in its path, including the poor souls that are chained
                   |to the various posts around the room.

mobile.name: hell hound
mobile.long_descr: A hell hound runs freely through the halls of hell.
mobile.description:
This freak of a canine is rusty red to red-brown in color. Its eyes glow a
                   |ghastly red. Its sooty black teeth and tongue are covered with green spittle
                   |that runs down its dung covered coat.

mobile.name: frozen body
mobile.long_descr: A frozen body lies on the ground.
mobile.description:
As you look at the corpse, you recoil when you see that its eyes still
                   |move.  They stare intently from its bluish face, as if pleading for your
                   |help.

mobile.name: ice devil
mobile.long_descr: A Greater Ice Devil stands here, cheerfully freezing souls.
mobile.description:
This devil is a mix of bug, bird, humanoid, and who knows what else.
                   |Its multi-faceted eyes stare everywhere. It goes about its business of 
                   |slowly and painfully freezing the damned souls, quickly thawing them
                   |and then starting over. Every couple of minutes, it takes time out to 
                   |break an appendage off a nearby soul and beat the soul with it.

mobile.name: trapped soul ice
mobile.long_descr: A soul trapped under the ice gasps desperately for air.
mobile.description:
This poor soul has been incased in ice, almost as though it were caught
                   |under an iceflow.  It will desperately gasp for air for a few minutes,
                   |then will seem to die briefly.  Always, it is restored and begins thrashing
                   |about again.

mobile.name: half frozen body
mobile.long_descr: A half frozen body hangs on a meat hook.
mobile.description:
A large meat hook is imbedded deep within the back of the corpse. You
                   |see small white maggots eating away at the body. The flesh seems to
                   |move and wriggle with a life of its own...

mobile.name: killer penguin
mobile.long_descr: A small penguin waddles around on the ice.
mobile.description:
What a cute little penguin! Wait, why is it looking at you that way?
                   |HEY! Penguins don't have teeth!

mobile.name: I-scream worker
mobile.long_descr: An I-scream worker runs from machine to machine.
mobile.description:
It moves about so frantically that you can't really get a chance to look at it.
                   |It runs about screaming, 'I SCREAM, YOU SCREAM!
                   |
                   |WE ALL SCREAM FOR I SCREAM!!!'

mobile.name: Ice Screamer
mobile.long_descr: An Ice Screamer is yelling into empty cartons.
mobile.description:
He is dressed in a white jumpsuit with the words,
                   |
                   |'Eye Spleen I Screamery'
                   |
                   |written on it in large, yellow letters.

mobile.name: Construction Foreman Demonic
mobile.long_descr: A Demonic Foreman sits here, looking at blueprints.
mobile.description:
This huge demon has somehow managed to fit himself into
                   |a oversized, orange jumpsuit. The words,
                   |
                   |'4th DEMONsion Construction Co.' are written on the 
                   |back in large, black letters.
                   |He seems none too happy to see you.

mobile.name: Secretary of Hell
mobile.long_descr: The Secretary of Hell sits here, watching the phones ring.
mobile.description:
This very sexy secretary seems to be just sitting here amusing herself
                   |by watching the little lights on the telephone blink. She is oblivious
                   |to your presence and seems fascinated by the phones.

mobile.name: office worker hell
mobile.long_descr: An office worker from Hell is looking for a boss to piss off.
mobile.description:
Just looking at him makes your blood boil. 
                   |AAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrrrgggggghhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: records worker
mobile.long_descr: A records worker is here, filing bad reports.
mobile.description:
You see a rather plain-looking office personel here, filing paperwork on
                   |someone.

mobile.name: santa claus
mobile.long_descr: Santa Claus is here, checking on who has been naughty...
mobile.description:
It's a jolly old man, with red cheeks and a roly-poly belly and a laugh
                   |as jolly as you can get. Must be Santa Claus!

mobile.name: high priest ell
mobile.long_descr: The High Priest of Hell is here, eating 'I Scream'.
mobile.description:
The dark, black robes hide most of his features, but you can nearly make
                   |out his emaciated face beneath the hood.

mobile.name: bowl blood
mobile.long_descr: A bowl of blood sits on the altar.
mobile.description: It is a wooden bowl filled with blood and bits of flesh.

mobile.name: jury member
mobile.long_descr: A jury member sits here with a "Guilty" sign, waiting for the trial to begin.
mobile.description: It seems to be a lesser demon disguised as mortal. Fair trial?  Not likely.

mobile.name: Judge Whopper
mobile.long_descr: Judge Whopper sits here, trying to think of a painful sentence.
mobile.description:
This is the High Judge of Hell. He has never found anyone innocent
                   |and is notorious for his painful and harsh punishments.

mobile.name: lawyer hell
mobile.long_descr: The Lawyer from Hell sits here, playing games on his laptop computer.
mobile.description: Slimy, sleezy, and with very sharp teeth... A lawyer all right...

mobile.name: complaints officer
mobile.long_descr: The Complaints Officer is here, watching her favorite soap opera.
mobile.description:
She seems not to notice you, but is absorbed in her favorite soap,
                   |'As The Hell Burns'

mobile.name: bastard hiramoto
mobile.long_descr: The Bastard Hiramoto stands here, trying to learn Kung Fu from a book.
mobile.description:
He looks at you and says, 'I think my Kung Fu is no good'
                   |and then goes back to practicing.
                   |
                   |He is known to buy anything, and to sell anything sold to him.

mobile.name: maintenance worker
mobile.long_descr: A maintenance worker is here, fixing stuff.
mobile.description: He is in a yellow jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on the back.

mobile.name: weeds
mobile.long_descr: A weed is growing out of the cement.
mobile.description: You see a nasty yellow-and-purple weed.

mobile.name: stanley
mobile.long_descr: Stanley stands here, waiting to sell you one of his wonderful figurines.
mobile.description:
He is a crafty old fart who looks about 1000 years old, but his figurines
                   |are pretty well-known.  He was rumored to have disappeared around Solace 100
                   |years ago.

mobile.name: half eaten horse carcass
mobile.long_descr: A half-eaten horse carcass is here being digested.
mobile.description:
This is what used to be a horse.  Hmm, maybe - it's hard to tell.  Half
                   |of it has been digested already.

mobile.name: stomach dragon
mobile.long_descr: A stomach dragon is here, digesting Big Mouth's food.
mobile.description:
A large, brown-and-green, slime-covered reptile, its function seems to be
                   |to move to each food item and barf acid all over it.

mobile.name: rancid turkey leg
mobile.long_descr: A rancid turkey leg sits in a pool of slime.
mobile.description:
It's one of those really nasty pieces of food in the refrigerator that
                   |disappears, and you wonder if it just walked away....

mobile.name: reactor specialist
mobile.long_descr: A reactor specialist sits here, checking on the reactor core.
mobile.description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large nuclear-warning symbol on
                   |the back.

mobile.name: reactor worker
mobile.long_descr: A reactor worker sits here, monitoring various screens.
mobile.description:
He is dressed in a black jumpsuit with a large lighting bolt symbol on
                   |the back.

mobile.name: homer simpson
mobile.long_descr: Homer Simpson sits here, eating donuts.
mobile.description:
A balding fat man with jelly stains on his uniform.
                   |
                   |He suddenly spills his coffee and shouts out, 'DOH!'
                   |Warning lights blink rapidly as the coffee shorts out the control panel.
                   |Homer calmly stands up, unplugs the control panel, and sits down
                   |for a nap.

mobile.name: devil's food cake
mobile.long_descr: A nice slice of devil's food cake is here, waiting to be eaten.
mobile.description: Mmmmmm...Don't you just want to take a bite?

mobile.name: mad cook
mobile.long_descr: A mad cook is here, cooking up a storm.
mobile.description: He spots you and screams, 'Git awa froom mi food!  I'll kill you!'

mobile.name: frantic lady
mobile.long_descr: A frantic lady is here, looking in vain for a sale and tearing her hair out.

mobile.name: nuclear technician
mobile.long_descr: A nuclear technician is here, fiddling with his rad suit.

mobile.name: stray proton
mobile.long_descr: A stray proton is here, whizzing about.

mobile.name: radiation
mobile.long_descr: The radiation in the room does unknown things to you.

mobile.name: chief engineer hell
mobile.long_descr: The Chief Engineer of Hell is here, playing with the panic button.
mobile.description:
He kinda reminds you of an old Bart Simpson.  He seems to be enjoying
                   |the panic button at the moment, chuckling happily as workers on the
                   |reactor floor below frantically check dials and gauges, while lights
                   |are flashing and sirens are screaming in the background.

mobile.name: Greater Fire Demon
mobile.long_descr: A Greater Fire Demon stands here, laughing at each scream he hears..
mobile.description:
This large, black-scaled demon laughs merrily as he watches poor souls
                   |scream out in pain. He pokes and picks at the flesh of the damned who
                   |were unlucky enough to be tortured close to him.  His black-taloned
                   |nails rip slowly through their flesh as he cackles with glee at the
                   |sounds of their unending pain...

mobile.name: frozen side beef
mobile.long_descr: A frozen side of beef hangs on a hook.
mobile.description:
This enormous carcass looks as if it came from a small dragon or a very
                   |large cow.

mobile.name: guard dog
mobile.long_descr: A guard dog sits here, guarding the break room.
mobile.description: A vicious-looking pit bull / demon-dog mix is here, slobbering on the donuts.

mobile.name: juicy steak
mobile.long_descr: A mouth-watering, juicy steak is here, steaming.
mobile.description: Mmmmmmm.....Steak....Mmmmmm...You feel your mouth start to water.
